name: Pho
description: Vietnamese beef noodle pho is an easy soup to fall in love with. Those chewy noodles, that savory broth, the tender slices of beef - all those crunchy, spicy, herby garnishes we get to toss on top. On a cold evening, after a rough day at work, when we are sick, on a lazy weekend afternoon - a bowl of piping hot pho is pretty much always a good idea
cookingSteps: Oil, black pepper, sugar, salt, fishsfauce, eggs
ingredient: 1 pkg thin sliced beef about 12-16 oz.

name: Beef Steak
description: A beefsteak is a flat cut of beef, usually cut perpendicular to the muscle fibers. Beefsteaks are usually grilled, pan-fried, or broiled. The more tender cuts from the loin and rib are cooked quickly, using dry heat, and served whole.
cookingSteps: Oil, black pepper, sugar, salt, soy sauce, beef
